excludeGroups: BUILTIN - Unrestricted Access From Unmanaged Devices And Untrusted Locations

description:
What is it: Requires that a device be registered in Autopilot before enrolling in Intune.
 Simeon Notes: Prevent unauthorized devices from being enrolled into your tenant. In order to enroll a device a hardware hash must be uploaded to Intune or the user enrolling the device must be a member of the Azure AD group ‘BUILTIN - Device Enrollers’. Simeon’s baseline allows members of the Azure AD group ‘BUILTIN - Device Enrollers’ or 'BUILTIN - Unrestricted Access From Unmanaged Devices And Untrusted Locations' to enroll devices without being registered. Note, that a device that has been registered in Intune is considered compliant, even if it is not yet enrolled.
 Learn More: https://www.lieben.nu/liebensraum/2019/10/hidden-exceptions-to-conditional-access-mfa/
